thread.title: Max Norris
thread.title_full: American RV Company reviewed by Max Norris

author: Max Norris
title: Max Norris
text: The price was comparable to two of the local RV part retailers who did not have it in stock, and less than one half of a third dealer. The part I ordered shipped the same day (Friday) and i received it on Tuesday. I will use ARVC next time I need an RV part.
